page.title: 12LANDSCAPE OF BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: {BROOK VILLAGE. }In SE corner, a mixture of old & renovated cottages, with ornamental trees, a small green mown by cattle & ponies & dotted with mature oaks. {BRAMSHAW VILLAGE.}To N a road winds through gradually rising fertile grassland, past houses, private lake, village shop, farms, garages, blacksmith's forge, village hall & Warrens Estate. Richly vegetated hedgerows dominated by scattered oaks. {FRITHAM}A remote village on high ground, lying S&W of Longcross Plain with its pond, scrub & heather. Fine views in distance to Pipers Wait. {FOREST ENCLOSURES} Lie between Longcross & Blackbush Plains and Brook & Bramshaw villages.
